text: Lil Poldi Terselius (5 November 1944 â€“ 26 October 2021) was a Swedish actress. She was known for her role in Games of Love and Loneliness. She won the Eugene O'Neill Award in 2000. Terselius was born in Stockholm, Sweden. Terselius died on 26 October 2021 in Stockholm from an intracranial hemorrhage at the age of 76.
